entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Unexpected inlining results #109315
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests/ObjectStackAllocationTests.cmd #109314
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: JIT/Directed/lifetime/lifetime2/lifetime2.cmd #109313
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: WeakReference/IsAlive/IsAlive.cmd #109312
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: arrres_il_r fails #109311
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: ReJIT profiler test does not pass #109310
  • Crossgen outerloop regression: Stack overflow in hugeexpr1 and hugeSimpleExpr1 #109309
  • (De)Serialization of list of objects containing polymorphic generics in C# .Net8 with System.Text.Json #109307
  • Mysterious `NullReferenceException` when initializing a `List<int>` #109296
  • [API Proposal]: Add formatting support to `System.Net.ServerSentEvents` #109294
    10.0.0
  • OrderedDictionary perf with bad hashing #109293
  • [wasm] problem with native linking against skiasharp and emscripten 3.1.56 #109289
    10.0.0
  • [mono] [tvos] System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream.Tests.WorkItemExecution fail #109282
  • Windows SDK tools do not support working with heavy portable symbols files (Part 2) #109281
  • [mono] [android] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.IPGlobalPropertiesTest.IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet fails #109280
  • The 128-bit of interface dispatch cache entry and indirection cell's stub/cache mismatch the PalInterlockedCompareExchange128's atomically requirements #109276
    Future
  • IOptionsMonitor missing generic type constraint "where TOptions : class" #109274
    Future
  • Incorrect message for IL2026 for trim-sunsafe types in XAML type info metadata table #109272
  • 'ILLinkTreatWarningsAsErrors' doesn't seem to work when publishing as MSIX #109271
  • Several IL20XX trim warnings missed by analyzers, only show up with ILC #109270
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/StructABI/EmptyStructs/EmptyStructs.cmd #109269

Closed

  • int.TryParse has become ambigous when used with dynamic #109117
  • What's with "Enumerable.Reverse()"? #109255
  • [NativeAOT] Failing to resolve symbols of static libraries on win-x86 #109268

PullRequests

Created

  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add priority queue implementation #109319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable more red tests for crossgen lanes #109317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109295
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • add test for Int32 overflow for WriteGather in RandomAccess #109292
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • [release/9/0] Automate dl 9 0 #109291
    area-Workloads, 9.0.1
  • [release/8.0] Delete accidentally checked in file: src/libraries/System.IO.Ports/tests/file.pp #109290
    area-System.IO
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Link against debug version of LLVM in debug builds on Windows #109275
    area-Build-mono
  • Make ordered dictionary pointers always point to the front of the dictionary #109273
    area-System.Collections

Merged

  • Fix remaining reference from rename of size metric #109318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement `IXCLRDataProcess::GetTaskByOSThreadID` #109230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: enable devirtualization/inlining of other array interface methods #109209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove special REX.W handling for some instructions #109257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast for vpmultishiftqb #109267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set InstructionSet_EVEX flag in altjit. #108534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Bump downlevels for 9.0 #109288
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: fix naot-llvm abi #109224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: empty array enumerator opt #109237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109234
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast in more places #109258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable rollforward for inbuild variant of crossgen2 #109265
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for Options_RespectRequiredConstructorParameters_FeatureSwitch test #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • Factor LibraryImports in `System.Transactions.Local` to Common\ #109222
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Read back all replacements before statements with implicit EH control flow #109143
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0] [wasi] Disable build in .NET 9 #108877
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Enable policheck and tsa #108340
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta
  • Update remarks for `IsRealNumber` #108965
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on System.Version #109252
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for building with Clang 19 #109198
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Sending an extra information with type_load to avoid slowness. #109185
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] fix the building error for "PalInterlockedCompareExchange128" #108364
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't hardcode .NET Framework test projects in helix submission #44490

Closed

  • [WebToolsE2E] The minimum VS version required in .NET 9 is 17.8.3. #44204

PullRequests

Created

  • Default sign to false for all SB legs #44489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix .NET Framework test helix submission #44481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run MoveDotNetBuildLogs target even when the repo build fails #44480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [Draft] Adding --format support to `dotnet new list` #44140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove additional TL characters from the dotnet run output special casing for tests #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44469

  • dotnet-format: Support hidden severity for analyzers and code fixes #43929
    untriaged, Area-Format

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliSense loses track of types of variables #75652
  • completion make it hard to use an undeclared generic type parameter as return value #75651
    17.13

Closed

  • Symbols not published for 4.11.0 #75407
    17.12
  • Error when opening Intellisense suggestion to resolve CA2012 #66726
    17.8
  • Pull method up to interface doesn't show interface name when method name is too long (matters when multiple interfaces) #70316
  • Intellisence ignores protected accessibility for constructor in derived classes #70235
    Backlog
  • [return: NotNullIfNotNull(nameof(arg))] should apply to T with async Task<T> methods #67939
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure discards are initially soft selected in VSCode #75655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce allocations in VirtualCharService.CreateVirtualCharSequence #75654
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Workaround for binding redirect generation issue #75653
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Remove redundant IsMono #75649
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • update configs for 17.13p2 snap #75650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add tests for `unmanaged` constraint #75629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix ref safety analysis of captured locals #75627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Minimal does not set response type nullability #58681
  • MVC App with nullable return type should include 204 No Content response #58680
  • Perf regression: json, json_spring #58679
  • AOT warnings on minimal API Map* methods outside of Program.cs #58678
  • QuickGrid error: A second operation was started on this context instance before a previous operation completed #58669
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #58665

Closed

  • Add built-in support for generating OpenAPI document from APIs #54598
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: json_ntex #58666
  • Blazor Kubernetes/Minikube behind ingress/nginx sigin-oidc not working #58668
  • .Net 9 Blazor Server doesn't find components in interactive mode #58625
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58654
  • Perf improvement: https #58635

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58676
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24527.7 #58671
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Always use --apply-cop-headers in ThreadingAppTest #58642
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/2.3] Update EF Submodule to 2.3 #58613
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Fully qualify type names for services when resolving in RequestDelegateGenerator #58640
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [release/6.0] Test on CentOS 7, not RedHat 7 #58561
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Use MacOS-13 in CI #58549
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • public EventArgs with internal properties #25563
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] Windows debugger crashes often with SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 5.4, works with Preview 4.1 #25562
  • HapticFeedback for iOS crashes on iOS 17.4 since SR2 #25560
    .NET 9 SR1
  • ImageButton dosen't scale Image correctly #25558
  • Embedded web view for blazor hybrid #25557
    Triaged
  • CollectionView Programmatic-Selection is not updated when binding the selectedItem #25551
  • Map Polygons Are Rendered Multiple Times #25547
  • An Error #25546

Closed

  • Unable to add localization for .NET MAUI app in VS Code on macOS #25260
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25322
  • Can`t pack maui at local using public resource #25441
  • Cannot deploy a maui applikation on IOs! #25451
  • Update AOT profile on NET 9 GA branch #25403
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Hot Reload Got Error in blazor hybrid #25556
  • XCode 16/iOS 18 - Stable app now crashes almost immediately. #25229
  • Menu Bar - ContentPage.MenuBarItems doesn't render on Android? #25516
  • sign in to apple give authentication service unavailable in visual studio 2022 #25531
  • [iOS] Border`s Render was not correctly in CollectionView #23620
    Backlog
  • [Android] Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id 0x7f0900fd (com.twe.elon:id/labeled) for fragment NavigationRootManager_ElementBasedFragment{e99ccf3} (d735450b-8b7e-4e10-87d0-3b9a8251e4b3 id=0x7f0900fd)' #24774 #25113
  • [Android] Unable to find the default constructor on type Microsoft.Maui.Platform.NavigationRootManager+ElementBasedFragment #25106

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS UIImpactFeedbackGenerator should be used on iOS 17.5 and up #25561
  • [Testing] Added UITests method overrides allowing the use queries #25559
    area-testing
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    community ✨
  • Fix [Android]Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #25554
    community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix toggle for including sample content in template #25549
    t/bug, area-templates, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly #25545
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Updated

  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [ci] Update versions sdk/runtime #25535
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton

    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview

    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • public IReadOnlyCollection<string> with private backing field throws exception when trying to add migration #34996

Closed

  • Issue Running EF Core Migration Bundle in .NET SDK Container Image on Linux Debian (WSL2) #34979
  • EF Core - SQLClient includes all columns from a joined table in the SQL query, even when only one field is explicitly selected #34980
  • Scaffolded migrations are invalid when a type in the global namespace is referenced #34993
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. #34960
    10.0.0
  • Owned Properties don't support ComplexType. #34992

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Update macOS images to 13 #35005
    tell-mode
  • [release/9.0-staging] Update macOS images to 13 #35004
    tell-mode
  • Update macOS images to 13 #35003
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.44.1 to 3.45.0 #35002
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Better cast/convert support for Cosmos #35000
  • Support translating some string functions when they have a char parameters #34999
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have a type/type mapping #34995

Merged

  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.13.0 to 1.13.1 #35001
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [TINY] Do not return null namespace for Types #34994
  • Update .Sources package reference #34973
  • Fix to #34960 - System.Text.Json.JsonReaderException: '0x00' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data #34969

Updated

  • Apply fix from #34729 to Cosmos SqlExpressionFactory to keep it in sync #34964
